archiefmat.titel: War Office and predecessors; in-letters and miscellaneous
archiefmat.titel_eng: War Office and predecessors; in-letters and miscellaneous
archiefmat.scope: Original despatches, letters and papers sent to the Secretary-at-War, 1755 to 1795, and to the Secretary of State for War, 1794 to 1865. Those sent to the Secretary of State relate for the most part to the conduct of the French Wars or to the military business of the Colonial Office
